name: Really Really Really Really Mini Golf
name_original: Really Really Really Really Mini Golf
description:
Full Screen Recommended

3 hole mini golf course set in a house, the player and ball have been shrunk down to a tiny size and must travel through the house to find food.

Controls:

Space - Increase power of shot

A/D - Move ball angle

Enter - Hit ball

Known bugs/issues:

Lighting issues on all holes after pressing start button.

Audio playing twice.

Audio cutting short.
